Name: Minty Meat Rolls
Title: Minty Meat Rolls
Desc: Though this might be its current form, think about it for a moment: did this dish first start as mint rolled around meat, or meat rolled around mint?

Talent.Name: Minty Meat Rolls
Talent.Desc: Before this Round ends, the target character's next 3 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Normal Attacks</color> cost 1 less $[K309].\n(A character can consume at most 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3101}Food per Round)

K309.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1109}Unaligned Element</color>
K309.Desc: You may use Elemental Dice of any element to pay this type of cost.
